info.title: Sigilum API
info.description: Agent identity and authorization registry. Manages namespaces, authorization requests (stored as claims), verification, DID resolution, webhooks, and dashboard authentication.

tags.name: Authorizations
tags.description: Authorization request lifecycle (route names retain /claims for compatibility).

tags.name: Services
tags.description: Service management, API keys, and service webhooks

get.description: Returns health status with current timestamp.

Get approved authorization records for a service across namespaces (used by SDK/gateway cache). Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Must match the authenticated service slug when provided

get.description: Resolve a namespace to its current metadata and active approved claim count. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

List authorization requests for a namespace with optional status/service filtering. Requires namespace-owner authentication. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

post.description: Submit an authorization request on behalf of an agent to a service. Requires a service API key. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

200.description: Existing pending or approved authorization request

get.description: Retrieve details for a specific authorization request by ID. Requires namespace-owner authentication. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

post.description: Approve a pending authorization request in your namespace. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

Reject a pending authorization request in your namespace. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

Revoke an approved authorization request in your namespace. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

get.description: Check whether a public key is currently approved for a service/namespace pair. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

Resolve a `did:sigilum:<namespace>` DID to a DID document. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).
Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

get.description: Returns registration options for adding an additional passkey to the current account. Requires Sigilum signed headers: signature-input, signature, sigilum-namespace, sigilum-agent-key, sigilum-agent-cert (and content-digest when body is present).

BearerAuth.description: Service API key passed as Authorization: Bearer <service_api_key>.

SignatureInputHeader.name: signature-input
SignatureInputHeader.description: RFC 9421 Signature-Input header for Sigilum signed-auth.

SignatureHeader.name: signature
SignatureHeader.description: RFC 9421 Signature header for Sigilum signed-auth.

SigilumNamespaceHeader.name: sigilum-namespace
SigilumNamespaceHeader.description: Sigilum namespace bound to the signing certificate.

ContentDigestHeader.name: content-digest
ContentDigestHeader.description: Required for requests with a non-empty body. Must match the SHA-256 digest of the exact request body.
